item.title: Hugo quick start
item.description: This quick start uses macOS in the examples. For instructions about how to install Hugo on other operating systems, see install. It is recommended to have Git installed to run this tutorial. Step 1: Install Hugo Homebrew, a package manager for macOS, can be installed from brew.sh. See install if you are running Windows etc. 1 brew install hugo To verify your new install:
